title: @Riot I got an idea for a Malzahar Skin.
body:
He would be in a snow suit and would say quotes like it's freezing or some other stuff like that, the skin would be 1350 because of some particle effects.

The voiding would be a poro that spawns every 4 spells. His Q would be 2 ice balls and snow comes out. His W would be like a frozen lake, his E would have a cloud with snow coming down on the enemy as they get chillier by the second. His R would be like a snowblower blowing snow into somebody's face.




Edit: It could also show a poro snax above an enemy with his E on them, idk.

replies.body: I feel like you're cheating. Anytime you can squeeze a poro into a skin idea I want it.
There is one problem with this skin.Nobody is going to attack the poro.
This is what I've said about all of these type of ideas. **Poro skins aren't OK if it's possible to attack the poro.**

The skin idea seems awesome! The ideas of poros and snow doesn't really fit Malzahar though.. He's like, a human that entered the void and was corrupted. Having poros as a skill would make it seem unfair since no one else gets them :P

While its an interesting concept I dont personally like it. I mean thematically it feels really forced. like Snowmerdinger is he's a snowman and so ice stuff makes sense. Snow day ziggs he throws snow balls instead of bombs and theres complete cohesion, but a rag tag half poro/snow half like weather person who also has a snow blower? Yes I know skins dont require that sort of cohesion, but I dont think that idea is as cool as it coul be thats for sure.
